mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, u.user_birth, CURDATE())-(RIGHT(CURDATE(), 5) < RIGHT(u.user_birth, 5)) AS user_age, IFNULL(re.job_history, 0) AS job_history, re.resume_no, l.like_count FROM tbl_user u JOIN (SELECT user_id, COUNT(like_type) AS like_count FROM tbl_like WHERE like_type = 'C' GROUP BY user_id) AS l JOIN (SELECT r.user_id, s.skill_code, r.title, r.job_history, r.resume_no FROM tbl_resume r, tbl_resume_skill s WHERE r.resume_no = s.resume_no) AS re WHERE u.user_id = l.user_id AND u.user_id = re.user_id GROUP BY re.user_id, u.user_name, user_age, re.job_history, l.like_count ORDER BY like_count DESC LIMIT 8;

SELECT hstr.job_post_no, jp.title AS job_post_title, hstr.pass_yn, re.resume_no, re.title AS resume_title, re.job_history, re.user_id, us.user_name, us.user_gender, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, us.user_birth, CURDATE())-(RIGHT(CURDATE(), 5) < RIGHT(us.user_birth, 5)) AS user_age , hstr.pass_yn , hstr.aplc_hstr_date FROM -- 지원이력 (SELECT job_post_no, resume_no, aplc_hstr_date -- CASE pass_yn -- WHEN 'Y' THEN '합격' -- WHEN 'N' THEN '불합격' -- ELSE '미확인' END AS pass_yn , pass_yn FROM tbl_aplc_hstr WHERE job_post_no IN (SELECT job_post_no FROM tbl_job_post WHERE company_id = #{companyId})) AS hstr LEFT JOIN tbl_job_post jp ON hstr.job_post_no = jp.job_post_no -- 기업정보 LEFT JOIN tbl_resume re ON hstr.resume_no = re.resume_no -- 이력서 정보 LEFT JOIN tbl_user us ON re.user_id = us.user_id -- 유저 정보 WHERE jp.company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY hstr.aplc_hstr_date DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT A.resume_no, A.skill_code AS code, B.name AS name FROM tbl_resume_skill A LEFT JOIN (SELECT CODE, NAME FROM tbl_gubn WHERE group_code = 'SKILL') B ON A.skill_code = B.code WHERE A.resume_no = #{resumeNo}
